text: Ara imanadara purusa o imanadara nari eke aparera sahayaka. Tara bhala kathara siksa deya ebam manda theke birata rakhe. Namaya pratistha kare, yakata deya ebam allaha o tamra rasulera nirdesa anuyayi jibana yapana kare. Edera'i upara allaha taâ€™ala daya karabena. Niscaya'i allaha parakramasila, sukausali.
